name: Snap, Inc.
goal: Snap, Inc. is a camera company.  Our products empower people to express themselves through the camera. Snapchat is about communicating with friends and family, living in the moment, learning about the world, and having fun together. Spectacles are a hands free video camera that allow users to share their memories on Snapchat more easily.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
-Initiatives related to privacy and security
-Initiatives related to law enforcement cooperation
-Initiatives related to online safety
-DSA
-AVMS
-E-communications
-Digital taxation
-Digital content
-Competition
